name: Gadget Pulse
description: A responsive e-commerce platform for mobile and electronics shops, built with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI.
challenges: Implementing dynamic filtering and ensuring seamless responsiveness.
futurePlans: Adding payment gateway and user authentication.

name: Peddy - Pet Adoption Platform
description: A platform to connect pet adopters with pet owners, providing detailed pet profiles and adoption requests.
challenges: Managing real-time data updates and user authentication.
futurePlans: Integrating a chat system for adopters and pet owners.

name: FitForge - Fitness Tracker
description: A fitness tracking website that helps users log workouts and track progress.
challenges: Creating an efficient database schema and handling user data securely.
futurePlans: Adding AI-powered workout recommendations and social features.
